item.title: Fuel Jettison System Fuel Jettison Control Cards

remarks.para: One may be inoperative provided the remaining FJCC is verified to be operative before departure.

placard.para: Placard adjacent to fuel jettison module in the cockpit: "JETTISON FUEL SYS CNTRL CARD INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

note.para: The repetitive inspection required when this item is inoperative must be documented in the Aircraft Logbook at the prescribed intervals. (Refer to GMM, Chapter 3, Section 6.)

numlitem.para: Verify Fuel jettison control card operation by performing fuel jettison control care operational test (AMM 28-31-00/501).
